00008 MainWindow::MainWindow(QWidget *parent) :
00009     QMainWindow(parent),
00010     ui(new Ui::MainWindow)
00011 {
00012     ui->setupUi(this);
00013

00018 
00019     QVBoxLayout *editorGroupLayout = new QVBoxLayout(ui->transferFunctionGroupBox);

00047 MainWindow::~MainWindow()
00048 {
00049     delete ui;
00050     if (volume != NULL) {
00051         delete volume;
00052         volume = NULL;
00053     }
00054 }

00056 void MainWindow::setDefault()
00057 {
00058     // set default stops
00059     QGradientStops stops;
00060 
00061     stops << QGradientStop(0.00, QColor::fromRgba(0xff000000));
00062     stops << QGradientStop(1.00, QColor::fromRgba(0xffffffff));
00063 
00064     m_gradient_editor->setGradientStops(stops);
00065     m_volume_renderer->setGradientStops(stops);
00066 }
00067 
00068 void MainWindow::reset_slicing_scrollbar()
00069 {
00070     if (volume != NULL) {
00071         int idx = ui->slicingComboBox->currentIndex();
00072         if (idx == 0) { // X Axis
00073             ui->slicingScrollBar->setMaximum(volume->GetWidth() - 1);
00074         } else if (idx == 1) { // Y Axis
00075             ui->slicingScrollBar->setMaximum(volume->GetHeight() - 1);
00076         } else if (idx == 2) { // Z Axis
00077             ui->slicingScrollBar->setMaximum(volume->GetDepth() - 1);
00078         }
00079         ui->slicingScrollBar->setValue(0);
00080     }
00081 }
00082 
00083 void MainWindow::update_slicing_view()
00084 {
00085     ui->slicingView->setDirection(ui->slicingComboBox->currentIndex());
00086     ui->slicingView->setPosition(ui->slicingScrollBar->value());
00087 
00088     // set view size to natural size of volume so image isn't scaled
00089     if (volume)
00090     {
00091         ui->slicingView->setMinimumSize(volume->GetWidth(), volume->GetHeight());
00092         ui->slicingView->setMaximumSize(volume->GetWidth(), volume->GetHeight());
00093     }
00094     ui->slicingView->repaint();
00095 }
00096 
00097 void MainWindow::on_actionDatensatz_laden_triggered()
00098 {
00099     QString fileName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, tr("Datensatz laden"), ".", tr("DAT files (*.dat)"));
00100 
00101     // user may abort the file dialog, in which case the file name will be empty
00102     if (!fileName.isEmpty())
00103     {
00104         // free the old volume, if any
00105         if (volume)
00106             delete volume;
00107 
00108         volume = new Volume(fileName.toStdString());
00109 
00110         ui->slicingView->setVolume(volume);
00111         ui->slicingView->setDirection(SlicingView::DIRECTION_X);
00112         ui->slicingView->setPosition(0);
00113         ui->slicingView->repaint();
00114 
00115         reset_slicing_scrollbar();
00116         update_slicing_view();
00117         //std::cout << "Volume (" << volume->GetWidth() << "x" << volume->GetHeight() << "x" << volume->GetDepth() << ") loaded." << std::endl;
00118     }
00119 }
00120 
00121 void MainWindow::on_actionBeenden_triggered()
00122 {
00123     QApplication::quit();
00124 }
00125 
00126 void MainWindow::on_slicingComboBox_currentIndexChanged(int index)
00127 {
00128     reset_slicing_scrollbar();
00129     update_slicing_view();
00130 }
00131 
00132 void MainWindow::on_slicingScrollBar_valueChanged(int value)
00133 {
00134     update_slicing_view();
00135 }
